nodes.text: Gusha's Luck was a cantina that belonged to Gusha. It was located in Mos Eisley on Tatooine. In 137 ABY, the cantina was visited by Cade Skywalker, Jariah Syn, and Gunn Yage.
Gusha's Luck was known to serve both Tatooine Sunrises and Corellian ale.

According to the glossary in Legacy 38, "gusha" means lucky in Huttese. This would mean that the bartender's name is "Lucky" (a possible reference to rabbits' feet being thought to be lucky) and that his cantina is named "Lucky's Luck."
